title: Data Access
text: Science products are available to download with a Single Sign On on MOSDAC. Click Here to access the data

title: Data Sources
text: GSMaP_MVK product, NOAA Climate Prediction Center (CPC) rainfall analysis, CPC Infrared brightness temperature, IMD gridded rain (0.25 degree), etc.

title: Processing Steps
text: -For gauge adjustment, the software used was JAXA MCD_V05.02, based upon Mega et al. (2019). -Merging NOAA CPC and Indian gauges was accomplished using Matlab software. -The algorithms pertaining to GSMaP_ISRO are provided in Kumar et al. (2022) in detail.

title: Derivation Techniques and Algorithm
text: The manuscript titled "Long-Term High-Resolution Gauge Adjusted Satellite Rainfall Product Over India" provides a description.

title: Limitations
text: The number of gauge stations within a NOAA CPC pixel of 0.5 degree impacts the accuracy of the gauge-adjusted rainfall.

title: Known problems with data
text: No known issues at this time.
